block_comment: This block of code is responsible for assigning a value to the `D_logic_op_raw` variable. Depending on whether a condition (D_is_opx_inst) is true or false, it assigns different values: if `D_is_opx_inst` is true, `D_logic_op_raw` is assigned the value of `D_iw_opx[4:3]`; else, it is assigned the value of `D_iw_op[4:3]`. This is achieved using a ternary conditional operator in Verilog, which follows the format of `(condition) ? (value if true) : (value if false)`.
